VARIABLES.DESCRIPTION: The server was expecting the parameter ‘session_id’ which was not provided by the client
The server was expecting the parameter ‘input’ which was not provided by the client
The parameter ‘input’ contains an invalid value, the value cannot be empty.

VARIABLES.MESSAGE: The session is no longer available
VARIABLES.DESCRIPTION: The requested session has expired or an error has raised which enabled the session to no longer be available

VARIABLES.MESSAGE: The given language code is not a valid ISO 639-1 Language Code
VARIABLES.DESCRIPTION: The given language code is not a valid ISO 639-1 Language code that the server is willing to accept.

VARIABLES.MESSAGE: Session cannot be created, service unavailable
VARIABLES.DESCRIPTION: The session cannot be created because CoffeeHouse is temporarily unavailable. If this issues continues then report it to support
